Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) funded a three-year project, End-Use Load Profiles for the U.S. Building Stock, that culminated in this publicly available dataset of calibrated and validated 15-minute resolution load profiles for all major residential and commercial building types and end uses, across all climate regions in the United States. These EULPs were created by calibrating the ResStock and ComStock physics-based building stock models using many different measured datasets, as described here.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: This dataset includes load profiles for both the baseline building stock and the building stock with various energy efficiency, electrification, and demand flexibility upgrades applied.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We use lotus to prepare data. This is from filecoin network and we have learned it.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, IPFS, Shipping hard drives
